title: STUDY PLAN
content: The Applied Bachelor's in Land Transportation Management program aims to produce graduates with high competencies in managing and planning land transportation systems. This program integrates theory, data analysis, and field practices to create innovative and sustainable transportation solutions. Students will learn about transportation operational management, traffic planning, logistics, advanced transportation technologies, and land transportation regulations. Graduates are prepared to become professionals capable of addressing the challenges of land transportation in the era of globalization and digitalization.
